description: Try our easy to follow Pork Cutlets In Ginger Beer With Colcannon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork Cutlets In Ginger Beer With Colcannon
name: Pork Cutlets In Ginger Beer With Colcannon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, steam or microwave peas until tender. Drain. Serve pork cutlets with colcannon, peas and pan sauce.
